articles.title: Talks between DPRK FM and Governor of Khabarovsk Territory Administration of Russia Held
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK FM and Governor of Khabarovsk Territory Administration of Russia Held
						
 Moscow, October 7 (KCNA) -- Talks between Ri Su Yong, foreign minister of the DPRK, and Byacheslav Shport, governor of Khabarovsk Territory Administration of Russia, took place at the administration's guest house on Oct. 7.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were the DPRK foreign minister's party and the DPRK consul general in Nakhodka, the DPRK deputy consul general in Khabarovsk and from the Russian side were the first vice-prime minister of the administration and other officials concerned. 
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on boosting the bilateral friendly relations in various fields.
					
					 That day the DPRK foreign minister and his party laid a bouquet before the monument of heroes in Slava Square and visited folklore museum, etc. They were entertained to a reception given by the Khabarovsk Territory Administration.
					
					 During their stay in Moscow they placed a wreath before the tomb of unknown soldiers by the side of the Kremlin Castle Wall and went round the Lenin Mausoleum in the Red Square.
					
					 They also toured the Central Museum of the Great Patriotic War on Poklonnaya Hill in Moscow and other places.
					
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK foreign minister and his party met and conversed with Oleg Kozhemyak, governor of Amur Region of the Russian Federation. They toured Bureya Hydropower Station, a state farm, a milk processing company, etc.

articles.title: Greetings to Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ugandan President 
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of the Republic of Uganda, on Monday on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of its independence. 
					 The message said he was pleased that the government and people of Uganda are preserving peace and security of the country and achieving sustained economic development under the leadership of the president.
					
					 The message sincerely wished the Ugandan president bigger successes in his responsible work and Uganda prosperity, believing that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Uganda would grow stronger.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to an official concerned on Wednesday by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un Adopted by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un Adopted by Koreans in China
						
 Beijing, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China held a meeting at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Oct. 7 to adopt a message of greeting to Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 Present there were the chairman of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the association and Koreans in China.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps Here
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps Here
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were conveyed to an official concerned on Wednesday by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan who is doyen of the diplomatic corps and Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez.

articles.title: Reception Given by Egyptian Military Attache
articles.content:
Reception Given by Egyptian Military Attache
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Waleed Elsayed Mohamed Ahmed, military attache of the Egyptian embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Wednesday on the occasion of the Army Day.
					 Present there on invitation were generals and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed, Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials were on hand.

articles.title: Oratorical Meeting Held by Trade Union Officials, Members
articles.content:
Oratorical Meeting Held by Trade Union Officials, Members
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- An oratorical meeting was held by officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea at the Central Hall of Workers on Wednesday to celebrate the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th founding anniversary of the glorious WPK.
					 Nam Chun Bin, chairman of the primary organization of the federation of Pyongyang Railway Station, in an oratory "Strong Roots" eulogized the greatness of President Kim Il Sung who accomplished the historic cause of the party founding without delay in the liberated country on the basis of party building successes and experience gained in the flames of the hard-fought anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 In an oratory "Undying Feats" Ro Man Gi, worker of the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine, highly praised Kim Jong Il for building the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and a genuine mother party which takes care of the destiny of the popular masses in a responsible manner.
					
					 In oratories "Great Defender" and "Korean Speed" Won Kyong Ok, trade union explainer of the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, and Ryu Chang Sun, trade union lecturer of the Pyongyang Railway Maintenance Team, said that Marshal Kim Jong Un is arousing the Korean people to create the Korean speed startling the world people while preserving and carrying forward the revolutionary traditions of the WPK.
					
					 In an oratory "We Know Nobody but You" Kim Un Jong, trade union lecturer of the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, vowed to carry forward and accomplish the cause of Mt. Paektu under the leadership of the party just as the first and second generations of the revolution did to feature the grim road of the revolution with victory and glory under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Concert Given by National Symphony Orchestra
articles.content:
Concert Given by National Symphony Orchestra
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Concert "Fly High, Our Party Flag" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theater on Wednesday on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Put on the stage were orchestra overtures "Fly High, Our Party Flag" and orchestra "Thinking of General" and violin duet "Voice from My Heart".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats of Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK into an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization, with the leader as the center and built it into the mother party serving the people by defending and successfully carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's idea of party building and his feats.
					
					 Among the audience were senior officials of the party and state including Kim Yong Nam, officials of the party and power bodies, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials, persons of merit and labor innovators of institutions and industrial establishments in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth, Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth, Students Held
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Wednesday, the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Venues of dancing parties including the Monument to Party Founding and plazas of the Arch of Triumph and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium turned into a sea of dancers to the tune of song "Please Accept Best Wishes of People".
					
					 When songs "Our General Is the Best" and "Glory to Our Great Party" were played, the participants presented cheerful dances, recollecting the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il in party building.
					
					 The dancing parties reached climax when "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" and "Train to the Front" and other songs resounded forth at the venues pervaded with joy and enthusiasm of young people.
					
					 Similar dancing parties also took place in provincial capitals on the same day.

articles.title: Presentation of Participants in Schoolchildren Art Competition Made
articles.content:
Presentation of Participants in Schoolchildren Art Competition Made
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 9th Schoolchildren Individual Art Competition made a presentation at the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace on Wednesday on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th anniversary of the founding of the WPK.
					 Put on the stage were yanggum solo "Our Father", folk solo "We Feel Grateful to the Party's Care" and female chorus "Let's Sing in Louder Voice Song of General Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The performers sang great thanks for and yearning for Kim Jong Il who developed the WPK into a mother party responsible for the destiny of the Korean people and the rising generation.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by such numbers as trio "Marshal Kim Jong Un Is Our Father" and narration "Sound of Waves".
					
					 Among the audience were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, officials concerned, officials of the youth league and school youth and children here.

articles.title: Birthday Spread Sent to Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread Sent to Centenarian
 Kaesong, October 8 (KCNA) -- A birthday spread sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un was conveyed to Ri Hye Gyong, a centenarian residing in Kaesong City.
					 She was born as a daughter of a land tenant and was subject to all sorts of maltreatment and contempt. It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that she could lead a worthy life.
					
					 She worked hard for the socialist homeland. She kept herself busy to be helpful to the country even after becoming a pensioner. She likes vegetables and soy-based food and leads an optimistic life.
					
					 She always tells her children to do a lot of good work for the grateful country, saying she enjoys longevity under the good socialist system.

articles.title: 2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest
articles.content:
2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The 2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest is under way here, drawing attention of local people.
					 The contest is attended by more than 1 400 players from 12 provinces and municipalities.
					
					 Each provincial team has more than 120 players including kindergarteners, primary and secondary schoolchildren, university students, workers, peasants, office workers as well as athletes.
					
					 Among them are a kindergartener weighing 43 kg, who is participating in ssirum (Korean wrestling) event, and 11 coaches from five families.
					
					 What catches one's eye is Kangwon provincial team's advance into the finals of ssirum, which took the sixth place last year.
					
					 For the ssirum event, every team should include nine players ranging from kindergarteners, primary schoolers to athletes.
					
					 Especially, the ssirum team of North Phyongan Province with Ri Jo Won, four-time winner of the Grand Bull Prize National Ssirum Contest, is drawing public attention.
					
					 North Phyongan and Kangwon provincial teams went into the finals of the event.

articles.title: Results of Provincial Mass Sports Contest in DPRK
articles.content:
Results of Provincial Mass Sports Contest in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Competitions in some events of the 2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest came to a close in the DPRK.
					 Their results are as follows:
						
					
					women swing -- 
					1. North Hamgyong Province
					
					                   2.  South Phyongan Province
					
					                   3.  Jagang Province 
					
					 200 m roller-skating of primary school boys and girls --
					
					1. Kangwon Province 
					
					2. South Hwanghae, Jagang provinces 
					
					3. Pyongyang Municipality, South Hamgyong Province
					
					 
					
					　The winners in 800 m and 5 000 m races of sports teams are:
					
					    
					
					   men's 800 m --      Tongmyongsan (Kangwon Province)
					
					    women's 800 m --  Suyangsan (South Hwanghae Province)
					
					    men's 5 000 m --    Suyangsan (South Hwanghae Province)
					
					    women's 5 000 m -- Ryesonggang (North Hwanghae Province)
					
					 
					
					 The contest continues.

articles.title: DPRK Displays Its Sports Power at 17th Asiad
articles.content:
DPRK Displays Its Sports Power at 17th Asiad
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK showed its rapid progress in sports through the 17th Asian Games.
					 Its athletes bagged a total of 36 medals at the recent Asiad, including 11 gold medals that mean the highest score the DPRK has earned since its start of participation in the Asian Games.
					
					 At the 17th Asian Games they made a "hot wind of DPRK" in football and other events, drawing the attention of world media and sportspersons.
					
					 In the football event, in particular, DPRK women and men teams made sweeping victories in the 19-day fierce matches.
					
					 Its women football team scored 11 goals in the group league and quarterfinals, without losing even one point and defeated its Japanese rival 3:1 in the finals, thus emerging the three-time winner in the wake of the 14th and 15th Asiads. After the gold-medal match, Kim Kwang Min, coach of the DPRK women's team, said: "We won the final against Japan and this inevitable result is because of our respected Kim Jong Un taking care of our players. We wanted to repay him for his love and care with victory."
					
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK men's football team beat UAE and Iraqi rivals, known to be strong teams in Western Asia, and took the silver medal at the games.
					
					 In this regard, foreign and south Korean media highlighted the news of matches played by the DPRK footballers and their results, praising the rapid football development in the DPRK.
					
					 Football coaches and experts of Japan, China and other countries highly appreciated the strong spirit and skills of the DPRK men and women footballers, expressing deep admiration at the rapid development of the DPRK's football technique.
					
					 In weightlifting the DPRK won four gold medals out of 15 in total and three of its weightlifters set five-time new world records.
					
					 The first gold for the DPRK at the games was taken by the world champion and London Olympic gold medalist Om Yun Chol. He broke the world record in men's 56 kg category by lifting 170 kg in jerk which led to lift of 298 kg in total.
					
					 Kim Un Guk, a London Olympic gold medalist, set world records in men's 62 kg category snatch one time and in total lift twice. On the secret of his success, he told reporters that the credit for it goes to the respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un who has given him strength and courage.
					
					 Kim Un Ju broke the world record in women's 75 kg jerk by lifting 164 kg while setting an Asian record with total lift of 292 kg.
					
					 Ri Jong Hwa finished first in women's 58 kg category weightlifting by jerking 134 kg which led to total lift of 236 kg, 1 kg more than hopeful Chinese rival's total lift.
					
					 Besides, weightlifters Kim Myong Hyok and Ryo Un Hui set Asian records in men's and women's 69 kg category snatch.
					
					 On such successes, world media said that the DPRK's weightlifting is in the golden age. South Korea's Yonhap News reported that the DPRK's weightlifting has risen to be a center of the world weightlifting, with the 2012 London Olympic Games as a starting point.
					
					 The DPRK also emerged winner in other sports events of the 17th Asian Games.
					
					 Its gymnast Hong Un Jong won a gold medal in women's vault with more than 15 points and Kim Un Hyang came first in women's balance beam with 14.700 points.
					
					 Jong Hak Jin and Kim Ji Song respectively came first in men's 57 kg freestyle wrestling and in men's individual mixed 10m running target shooting.
					
					 Jang Un Hui beat her Chinese rival 2:1 in the women's 75 kg boxing final, bringing to the DPRK the ninth gold medal.
					
					 In addition, the DPRK proved successful in judo, diving, synchronized swimming and other events.
					
					 Kim Hyok Bong and Kim Jong, who are the champions of the mixed doubles at the 52nd ITTF World Championships (individual event) and the 6th East Asian Games, overthrew their rivals of Hong Kong of China 4:1 in the finals of table-tennis mixed doubles, presenting the country with the 11th gold medal.
					
					 The signal achievements, scored by the DPRK athletes at the 17th Asian Games, have put the local people into tumult of joy, greatly inspiring them in their efforts to build a highly civilized nation under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Sinphyong Kumgang Restaurant
articles.content:
Sinphyong Kumgang Restaurant
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- On the way from the capital city of Pyongyang to Wonsan City, Kangwon Province in the DPRK there is Sinphyong Kumgang Restaurant in Phyonghwa-ri, Sinphyong County, North Hwanghae Province.
					 The restaurant is situated in a picturesque place surrounded by mountains and a man-made lake. It was a small teahouse 15 years ago, but has developed into the present general service centre.
					
					 It is now well-known among Koreans and foreigners for serving local foods like Codonopsis lanceolata, anise, aralia shoots, Songi mushroom, mandarin fish and carp.
					
					 After the birth of the ski resort on Masik Pass, the restaurant has become evermore crowded with visitors.
					
					 Pak Chang Guk, a staff of the restaurant, told KCNA that it gives 24-hour service to guests and has made possible efforts to satisfy them.

articles.title: New Kind of Beauty Injection Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Beauty Injection Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Botucain, presented by the Phyonghung Trading Company in the DPRK, won a high appreciation at the 10th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair held on September 22-25.
					 It is a newly-developed injection for beauty and treatment.
					
					 This injection helps relax muscular stiffness and remove pains. It is also efficacious for inflammation, autonomic nervous control and facial beauty.
					
					 According to its developer, the injection has been already applied to several leading hospitals in the country and the result shows that it is very good in treating dyskinesia by encephalorrhagia, cerebral thrombosis and cerebrospinal injury.

articles.title: Tragicomedy Produced by Unethical Crimes in U.S.: News Analyst
articles.content:
Tragicomedy Produced by Unethical Crimes in U.S.: News Analyst
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The chief for Secret Service of the U.S. White House resigned from office after being reprimanded by the president and Congress recently.
					 He was charged with irresponsible protection of the president.
					
					 Recently there were a series of failures in security service that stunned Obama.
					
					 An armed ex-convict dressed like a member of the Secret Service approached Obama on September 16 only to be discovered later to kick off a row and provoke public laughter.
					
					 Three days later a man in his 40s with a dagger in his hand crossed the fence of the White House and ran 180ms to reach the place where the president was making a speech, but everybody was not aware of what was going on.
					
					 Three years ago a robber fired a bullet into the White House building, breaking a window on the second floor and damaging part of the building. But the presidential guards were not aware of this incident even after the lapse of several days.
					
					 This case sparked off a flurry of censure. Such happening is absolutely intolerable in the White House and it discredited the Secret Service.
					
					 This means that the guards are entirely to blame for the case as they remained idle and easy-going.
					
					 But this is nothing but a trick to hush up the acts of turning the whole U.S. land into a theatre of horrible crimes and evade the responsibility for them.
					
					 The indolent attitude of the guards stems from the unethical acts of the U.S. policy-makers.
					
					 The U.S. is a cesspool of crimes.
					
					 In 2012 alone there occurred 1 214 464 high-profile crimes in the U.S. More than 30 000 people die and over 200 000 people get wounded due to gun-related crimes every year.
					
					 But the politicians and big conglomerates defy the demand of the people for enforcing restrictions on guns, bringing profits to them.
					
					 Common people are struck with horror due to man-killing taking place every minute while the privileged class seeks a more luxurious life. This is the reality of the corrupt American society.
					
					 The members of the Secret Service who are accomplices of the privileged class do not consider gun reports in streets of Washington as a warning against tension.
					
					 The Washington Post on September 27 said that during the 2011 White House shooting incident guards were not on an alert posture upon hearing gunfire. They just guessed someone fired his gun nearby. 
					
					 The situation goes to prove that the recent incident is no more than a tragicomedy produced by the unpopular and unethical acts of the U.S. authorities.
					
					 The arch criminals driving people into death through all sorts of crimes are none other than the privileged class and their fate is so wretched that their unethical acts are precipitating their doomsday.
					
					 Watching this tragicomedy, the world is deriding and censuring the U.S. for its poor human rights situation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Editorially Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as General Secretary of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Editorially Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as General Secretary of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) marked a historic event of great significance in strengthening the WPK and accomplishing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial.
					 Kim Jong Il was a peerless political elder as he developed the WPK into the most experienced and tested political staff in our era and put the dignity and position of the country and the nation on the highest level, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The history of his leading the party building is shining as a glorious history in which he brought about miracles and changes in all fields of the revolution and construction while setting an example of the era in building a ruling party under socialism with his brilliant ideological and theoretical wisdom and extraordinary leadership ability.
					
					 Already in the early period of leading the party he regarded it as a fundamental principle of party building and activities to establish the ideological system of the leader within the party. He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and wisely led the work to take a firm hold on it as the only guiding idea of the party and the revolution.
					
					 The ceaseless field guidance provided by him till the last moments of his life remains shining as a noble epic of his popular leadership to work out line and policies in reflection of the will and wishes of the popular masses and advance the revolution and construction by enlisting their energies.
					
					 The fighting capability of the WPK grew remarkably stronger thanks to the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il who oriented all party work to implementing the Songun revolutionary line and made the frontline-style political work methods of the People's Army and its spirit of devotedly implementing the party's policies prevail throughout the party. 
					
					 The WPK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un will remain loyal to the cause and behests of Kim Jong Il to the end and make every possible effort to bring earlier the future when the people will enjoy luxury and wealth under socialism, the editorial concludes.

articles.title: Implementation of North-South Joint Declarations Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of North-South Joint Declarations Urged in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a meeting in Inchon on Oct. 3 in commemoration of the 7th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 At the meeting an appeal was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					The appeal was sent to the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad by All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration. 
					
					 The speakers said the settlement of south-north issue was neither the issue of others nor the one to be solved by the international community. They went on:
					
					 It is the time when there should be responsible actions, not talk about confidence only. They should begin with the attitude of respecting the south-north joint declarations and implementing them.
					
					 They called for making the next year a year of turn in ushering in the second June 15 era, aware that reunification cannot be delayed any longer, as it will mark the 70th anniversary of Korean liberation and the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 They urged the south Korean authorities to come out to implement the October 4 declaration as it reflects the sincere desire of the Koreans of all social standings to see the south and the north become peaceful and prospering one and indicates concrete tasks and ways for doing so.

articles.title: Earthquake Hits Waters off Jeju Province, S. Korea
articles.content:
Earthquake Hits Waters off Jeju Province, S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 3 on the Richter scale occurred in waters near Jeju Province, south Korea, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 It was reported that the epicenter was in waters 20km southwest of Kosan-ri, Jeju City, Jeju Province.

articles.title: Lecture Given by Chongryon on Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Lecture Given by Chongryon on Anniversary of October 4 Declaration 
						
 Tokyo, October 7 (KNS-KCNA) -- A lecture was given at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Oct. 4, the 7th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were a vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and other members of its Central Standing Committee, leading officials of its organizations and enterprises and chairmen and officials of Chongryon headquarters in the Kanto area.
					
					 They watched a video on the 7th anniversary of the declaration.
					
					 Kang Min Hwa, vice-chairperson of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, gave a lecture titled "Historic October 4 declaration is immortal programme for reunification to usher in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the banner of By Our Nation Itself". 
					
					 The October 4 declaration was provided thanks to the will and patriotic bold decision of leader Kim Jong Il to carry out the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification, Kang said, referring to the contents, validity and vitality of the declaration.
					
					 Kang explained the positive steps taken by the DPRK to pave a new wide avenue for improving the north-south relations and reunifying the country under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Steadfast is the will of Koreans to preserve and implement the north-south joint declarations despite difficulties and ordeals in the way of realizing the cause of national reunification, Kang noted, and went on:.
					
					 Officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are convinced that Korea is sure to be reunified as Marshal Kim Jong Un is standing at the helm of the revolution.

articles.title: Anniversary of Oct. 4 Declaration Marked by Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
Anniversary of Oct. 4 Declaration Marked by Koreans in U.S.
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held an event in Los Angeles on Oct. 4 to mark the 7th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were members of Korean organizations including the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. and other compatriots.
					
					 Read out there was an appeal to all Koreans in the north, the south and overseas sent by All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration on the anniversary.
					
					 Speakers there referred to the atmosphere of reconciliation and cooperation mounted between the north and the south thanks to the adoption of the declaration.
					
					 Had the declaration been implemented, the road would have been paved for reunification, they noted.
					
					  It is nearly seven decades since the division of the Korean nation, they said, calling for ushering in the second June 15 era of reunification to put an end to the tragedy of division as early as possible.
					
					 They called on all Koreans to turn out as one for the reunification and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Serbian Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Serbian Political Party on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia posted leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" on its website on October 2. 
					 The work made public on October 2, Juche 84 (1995) reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea in which it explored a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the way of developing the party into his party for all ages.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Mexico 
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on October 3 brought out in booklet supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party". 
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It also indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's party.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed in Angola, Guinea
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed in Angola, Guinea
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting and round-table talks took place in Angola and a lecture and film show in Guinea between September 29 and October 1 to mark the 69th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in party building.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing the glorious history of the WPK.
					
					 A general in charge of security of the Presidency of Angola said the Korean people have firmly defended and glorified their idea and social system despite the ceaseless moves of the U.S. and its lackeys to stifle the DPRK, adding this was possible thanks to the invincible might of the WPK united close around the leader.
					
					 The general manager of an Angolan company paid highest tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who performed undying exploits by founding and developing the WPK.
					
					 A section chief of the technical department of the Guinean Ministry of Information said after watching the Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation":
					
					 I could know better about the might of the DPRK. The DPRK is, indeed, a great power.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at a lecture held in Guinea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Russia, Indonesia and Ethiopia on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were personages of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, an Indonesian company and an Ethiopian hospital and masses.
					
					 The first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Committee praised President Kim Il Sung as a great statesman who directed primary efforts to bolstering up the military capability from right after founding the WPK.
					
					 He added:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il who successfully carried forward the idea and cause of the President developed the WPK into his party by thoroughly applying the Juche idea to the party building and activities.
					
					 The WPK headed by respected Comrade Kim Jong Un is developing all fields in a Korean style after firmly establishing an independent principle.
					
					 I wish the Korean people big successes in their efforts for building a thriving socialist nation, united close around the WPK.
					
					 The manager of an Indonesian company praised the President and Kim Jong Il as prominent leaders recognized by the world and tender-hearted fathers of the people.
					
					 A vice-director of an Ethiopian hospital said the WPK could emerge a strong party which has struck its roots deep among the masses as it has enforced popular policies, placing them in the center of the work for shaping all policies. Rosy is the future of the WPK as it is absolutely supported by the broad masses, the vice-director added.

articles.title: Nepali Organizations Support October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Nepali Organizations Support October 4 Declaration
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, the Nepalese Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea and the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee of Nepal released a joint statement on Oct. 2 on the occasion of the 7th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, indicates the most correct way for promoting reconciliation, unity and exchange between the north and the south of Korea and ushering in a new phase of achieving independent reunification and peace and prosperity under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 We are sure that the contents of the declaration are very important for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, ensuring durable peace and prosperity not only on the Korean Peninsula but in the rest of Asia and developing the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 We hold that the Korean issue should be settled in line with the resolution of the 30th session of the UN General Assembly and Korea should be reunified in the idea of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and on the basis of the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity --published on July 4, 1972.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that the peace- and justice-loving heroic Korean people will certainly achieve a shining victory by foiling all the moves of the imperialists under the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between DPRK and Austria Marked in Vienna
articles.content:
Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between DPRK and Austria Marked in Vienna
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- There took place in Vienna on Oct. 2 a Korean stamp exhibition and a joint performance to mark the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Austria.
					 On display at the venue of the events were the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Displayed there were photos documenting the feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were stamps showing the history, geography and customs of Korea.
					
					 Present there were attended by the vice-director of the Federal Economic Council of Austria, personages of the foreign ministry, the Vienna, 21 District Committee of the Communist Party of Austria, the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK, members of the organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and the Juche idea study organizations, and the DPRK ambassador to Austria and his embassy officials.
					
					 Speeches were made at the event.
					
					 Then, DPRK students studying in Vienna and artistes of Austria gave a joint performance.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 52o aniversario de Independencia de Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 52o aniversario de Independencia de Uganda
						
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 52o aniversario de la Independencia de Uganda, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.
					En su mensaje, el remitente subrayo que esta complacido de que el gobierno y el pueblo de Uganda consolidan la paz y la seguridad del pais y logran incesante desarrollo economico bajo la direccion del presidente.
					
					Convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Uganda se desarrollen en el futuro tambien, deseo al destinatario mayores exitos en sus trabajos y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Canciller coreano se reune con gobernador de administracion de Jabarovsk de Rusia
articles.content:
Canciller coreano se reune con gobernador de administracion de Jabarovsk de Rusia
Moscu, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 7 en la casa de huesped del gobierno del territorio litoral las conversaciones entre el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong, de visita en Rusia, y el gobernador de la Administracion del Territorio Litoral de Jabarovsk de la Federacion Rusa, Byacheslav Shport.
					A la ocasion asistieron la comitiva del canciller, el consul general en Najodka y el subconsul general en Jabarovsk, por la parte coreana y por la contraparte, el primer vicepremier del gobierno del Territorio Litoral de Jabarovsk y otros funcionarios.
					
					En la ocasion, las ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones de ampliar y desarrollar en varias ramas las relaciones de  amistad entre los dos paises.
					
					El mismo dia, el canciller coreano y su comitiva depositaron ramo de flores ante el monumento a los heroes, erguido en la plaza Slava, y recorrieron el museo folklorico y otros lugares y participaron en el banquete ofrecido por el gobierno del territorio litoral de Jabarovsk.
					
					Durante la permanencia en Moscu, el canciller y su comitiva colocaron una ofrenda floral ante la tumba de los heroes desconocidos, construida al lado del Castillo Kremlin, y dieron vuelta por el Mausoleo de Lenin, situada en la Plaza Roja.
					
					Ademas, visitaron el museo central de Gran Guerra de la Patria, enclavado en la colina Poklonnaya y otros puntos.
					
					Tambien, departieron con el gobernador de la provincia de Amur, Oleg Kozhemyako y visitaron la central hidroelectrica Bureya, la granja estatal, una compania de elaboracion de leche y otros lugares.

articles.title: Concurso de oratoria de funcionarios y miembros de FGSC
articles.content:
Concurso de oratoria de funcionarios y miembros de FGSC
						
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la Casa Central de Obreros el concurso de oratoria de los funcionarios y miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea en ocasion del 17o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del 69o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					El presidente del Comite Primario de la FGSC en la Estacion de Pyongyang, Nam Chun Bin, en su oratoria intitulada "Raiz firme", elogio la noble personalidad del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien a base de los exitos y las experiencias  de la construccion del partido, logrados en el fragor de la ardua lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa, materializo sin demora la causa historica de la fundacion del Partido en la patria liberada.
					
					En la oratoria intitulada "Hazanas inmortales", el obrero de la Mina Carbonifera Juventud 8 de Febrero, Ro Man Gi, alabo las hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien convirtio el PTC en el Partido del Presiente Kim Il Sung y en el verdadero Partido madre que se responsabiliza absolutamente y cuida del destino de las masas populares.
					
					En las oratorias con los titulos "Gran defensor" y "Velocidad de Corea", la guia de la FGSC en el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae, Won Kyong Ok, y la conferenciante ambulante de la FGSC de la Brigada de Guardavias de Pyongyang, Ryu Chang Sun, subrayaron que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un defendio, heredo y desarrollo las tradiciones revolucionarias del PTC y llamo al pueblo a la creacion de la velocidad de Corea que admira al mundo.
					
					La conferenciante ambulante de la FGSC en el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung, Kim Un Jong, en su oratoria intitulada "No sabemos a nadie sino a Usted", destaco que como primera y segunda generaciones de la revolucion que registraron solo la victoria y la gloria en el severo camino de la revolucion enalteciendo a los  Generalisimos, llevara a feliz termino la causa iniciada en el monte Paektu bajo la direccion del PTC.

articles.title: Ofrecido concierto de Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
articles.content:
Ofrecido concierto de Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 17o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, se ofrecio el dia 8 en el Teatro Moranbong el concierto de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional "Flamea alto, bandera de nuestro Partido". 
					En la escena se pusieron el preludio orquestal "Flamea alto, bandera de nuestro Partido", la musica orquestal "Pensando en el General", el duo de violin "Voz de mi corazon", entre otras piezas. 
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron las imborrables proezas del Dirigente quien al defender y continuar con brillantez la idea y las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung en materia de construccion del partido, desarrollo el PTC como partido identico en lo ideologico y organizativo y unido en torno al lider y como  partido madre que sirve para el pueblo. 
					
					Vieron el concierto Kim Yong Nam y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, las entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los funcionarios de los organismos, fabricas y empresa, los ameritados e innovadores laborales de esta capital.
